channel.title: Vista
channel.description:
Im stuck with vista for the time being so i just wanted to ask a few questions about its compatibility;
Are all programs that are compatible with xp compatible with vista?
Are there any changes at all with regards to java? Can i still code with it?
Thats all for now, thanks for reading.

item.title: Vista
item.dc:creator: @haxerownsmopar haxerownsmopar
item.description:
@haxerownsmopar wrote:

burn vista keep xp

Read full topic

item.title: Vista
item.dc:creator: @Infinate .Infinate
item.description:
@Infinate wrote:

[quote=“Martin, post:9, topic:141806”][quote author=MujaheD link=topic=194136.msg1745886#msg1745886 date=1189436006]
Thanks for the advice guys… Btw Vista eats your ram up.
Another question:
What about all the microsoft programming languages, are there any changes?
[/quote]

If you download vb 6 it will be the exact same as it was before. same with visual c++ and all other IDEs/compilers. I just depends on whether they are compatible with vista[/quote]

Visual Basic 6 isn’t compatable with Vista. And it makes no difference to the standards of programming. It doesn’t make it harder to program just because you have vista.

Read full topic
